C_Cpp.clang_format_style: { BasedOnStyle: Google, TabWidth: 2, UseTab: true, ColumnLimit: 0, SpaceBeforeParens: false, SpaceInEmptyParentheses: true, SpacesBeforeTrailingComments: 1, SpacesInConditionalStatement: true, SpacesInContainerLiterals: true, SpacesInParentheses: true, IndentCaseLabels: true }
